roleset.name: come to be visible, again

example.name: reappear-v: with temporal
example.text: After it had reappeared the next two nights , Jenks went to higher headquarters and said : `` For three days now a German reconnaissance plane has been over the city taking pictures .

example.name: reappear-v: with locative
example.text: According to the myth , Old Order then vanishes at stage left and reappears at extreme stage right , but Director Shuz skillfully sidesteps the rather gooshey problem of stage effects by simply having Miss Arapacis walk across the stage .

example.name: reappear-v: all kinds of adjuncts
example.text: The tradition reached its apex , perhaps , in the works of Thomas Nelson Page toward the end of the century , and reappeared undiminished as late as 1934 in the best - selling novel So Red The Rose , by Stark Young .

propbank.arg: in the best - selling novel So Red The Rose , by Stark Young

roleset.note: REAPPEAR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reappear' based on sentences in brown. (from reappear.01-v predicate notes)
